sentence.Network_en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
Her daughters visited him from time to time when he was ill.
sentence.Network_cn: 他生病的时候她的女儿们时常去探望他。

sentence.Network_en: She was so ill that she was put on a respirator.
sentence.Network_cn: 她病得很严重，被戴上了人工呼吸器。
